pages.text: $(o)It's like a taser but for everything around you!$()$(br2)With the high-power EMF emitted by this armor, all nearby entities will be $(l)slowed, weakened, and nauseated!$() This effect can be toggled via $(l)$(k:immersiveweapons.key.toggleArmorEffect)$().Additionally, Tesla armor is the strongest armor available. You'll survive just about anything in it.
